title: Uncovering Fast Solid-Acid Proton Conductors Based on Dynamics of Polyanion Groups and Proton Bonding Strength
content:

Pjotrs Žguns, Konstantin Klyukin, Louis S. Wang, Grace Xiong, Ju Li, Sossina M Haile, Bilge Yildiz
Achieving high proton conductivity in inorganic solids is key for advancing many electrochemical technologies, including low-energy nanoelectronics and energy-efficient fuel cells and electrolyzers. A quantitative understanding of the physical traits...
